hero.title: Nomia
hero.tagline: Discover and Nomias that resonate with your identity

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Nomia is dedicated to helping trans and nonbinary individuals explore and discover names that truly reflect their identity. We provide comprehensive data on name trends, popularity, and cultural contexts to support your journey of self-affirmation.

features.title: Features
features.explore: Explore thousands of names with detailed statistics
features.filter: Filter by year, country, and gender balance
features.trends: View historical trends and popularity charts
features.affirming: Find names that affirm your authentic self

cta.subtitle: Begin your journey to finding the perfect name

emptyState.title: No Names Found
emptyState.description: Try adjusting your filters or search criteria
